doc.name: createElement
doc.description: Represents a the value for a single filter key

params.item: The specifications, written like a CSS selector

doc.code:
var element = FilterKit.createElement('div.ui.segment#the_segment[data-info="Some info"]', { dataPlugin: 'plugin data' });
// Will create an element which would have the HTML: <div class="ui segment" id="the_segment" data-info="Some info" data-plugin="plugin data"></div>
